name: Full Moon's Rise
originalText:
Werewolf creatures you control get +1/+0 and have trample.
Sacrifice Full Moon's Rise: Regenerate all Werewolf creatures you control.

rulings.text: In order to regenerate Werewolves involved in combat, you must sacrifice Full Moon’s Rise before combat damage is assigned. This means they will lose the +1/+0 and trample bonuses before combat damage assignment.

text:
